name: inContactCor
description: Extracts InContact metrics for cor servers from Windows Performance Counters

paramSchema=.title: counters
paramSchema=.description: This parameter contains the array of paths to each counter you want this plugin to retrieve.
paramSchema=.default: \processor(_total)\% processor time,\UCN Virtual Cluster\Processing Threads Blocking

paramSchema=.title: metrics
paramSchema=.description: This parameter contains the unique identifier of each collected counter as it will be identified in pulse.

paramSchema=.title: multipliers
paramSchema=.description: This parameter contains the multipliers for each counter that is collected.
